asia-culture.title: 把亞洲文化帶進文件基金會
asia-culture.intro:
在 2015 年的 LibreOffice Conference 中，我發表了台灣導入 LibreOffice 的故事。這次發表不只讓 LibreOffice 國際社群看到台灣的努力，也進一步讓他們想要主動瞭解與將亞洲文化帶進社群。於是我開始扮演這個橋樑，從行銷團隊，認證委員會到董事會，這兩三年來亞洲地區的活力與文化在文件基金會中引發了許多化學變化，也發生了一些有趣的故事…… 

----
[Collaborative notes on HackMD](https://hackmd.io/c/coscup18-gnome/%2Fcoscup18-gnome301-asia-culture)

Franklin Weng.speaker: Franklin Weng
Franklin Weng.name: Franklin Weng
Franklin Weng.intro: 軟體自由協會理事長，文件基金會董事會成員，LibreOffice 認證委員會委員與認證導入專家

gnome.title: GNOME.Asia Summit
gnome.intro: GNOME.Asia Summit is the featured annual GNOME Conference in Asia. The event focuses primarily on the GNOME desktop, but also covers applications and the development platform tools. It brings together the GNOME community in Asia to provide a forum for users, developers, foundation leaders, governments and businesses to discuss the present technology and future developments.GNOME.Asia Summits have been held in Beijing, Ho-Chi-Minh City, Taipei, Bangalore, Hong Kong, Seoul, Beijing, Depok, New Delhi, Chongqing respectively over the last ten years.
